article_title: The Chart That Could Sink Obamacare

article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: Health policy wonks are likely familiar with a chart that got wide circulation in the blogosphere in late October (especially among progressives)--characterized by David Weigel at Slate as "The Chart That Could Save Obamacare." Originally created by Brookings fellow Justin Wolfers and Tweeted on Halloween, the chart was based on estimates provided [...]
